speech: You can ask me to plan a trip for you ('I want to plan a trip from Portland State University to Expo Center') or you can ask for alerts at any MAX stop ('Are there any alerts at Rosa Parks MAX Station'), or you can ask for upcoming arrivals at any stop ('What is the next arrival at Moda Center MAX Station'), or you can ask for the closest station to you ('What is the closest stop to Peninsula Park'). What can I do for you?
